verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: Friday] [ARG1: that the U.S. will impose a 25 percent tariff on $ 50 billion of goods from China] .
President Trump announced Friday that the U.S. [V: will] impose a 25 percent tariff on $ 50 billion of goods from China .
President Trump announced Friday that [ARG0: the U.S.] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: impose] [ARG1: a 25 percent tariff on $ 50 billion of goods from China] .
